  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Familia de palabras</string>
            <string language="en">Word families</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortfamilien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Familles de mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Famílias da palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Famiglie di parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικογένειες λέξης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica interactiva (MUD) adreçada al cicle inicial de primària al voltant de les famílies de paraules -primitives i derivades-. Conté activitats de pràctica (Practica) en què es presenten els conceptes de família de paraules i paraula primitiva. Els conceptes explicats es reforcen a l'apartat Eina. També inclou activitats d'avaluació (Avalua't) en les quals es formen diferents famílies de paraules.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) aimed at 6- to 8-year-olds on lexical families  root words and derivatives. It includes practice activities that introduce the idea of word family and root word. These ideas are summarized in an explanatory note. Self-assessment exercises to form different word families are also included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material educatiu</string>
            <string language="en">instructional materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lexicologia</string>
            <string language="en">lexicology</string>
            <string language="es">lexicología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material multimèdia</string>
            <string language="en">multimedia material</string>
            <string language="es">material multimedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació primària</string>
            <string language="en">primary education</string>
            <string language="es">educación primaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) strebte 6 zu 8-year-olds auf lexikalischen Familien - 
verwurzeln Wörter und Ableitungen an. Sie schließt 
Praxisaktivitäten ein, die die Idee Wortfamilie und -wurzeldes wortes
vorstellen. Diese Ideen werden in einer erläuternden Anmerkung 
zusammengefaßt. Die Selbstbewertung Übungen, zum der 
unterschiedlichen Wortfamilien zu bilden sind auch eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) a
visé 6 à 8-year-olds sur les familles lexicologiques - enracinent 
des mots et des dérivés. Elle inclut les activités de 
pratique qui présentent l'idée du mot de famille et de racine de 
mot. Ces idées sont récapitulées dans une note explicative. 
Des exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment pour former différentes 
familles de mot sont également inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) visou 
6- a 8-year-olds em famílias lexicais - enraiza palavras e 
derivatives. Inclui as atividades da prática que introduzem a 
idéia da palavra da família e da raiz da palavra. Estas 
idéias são sumariadas em uma nota explanatória. Os 
exercícios do self-assessment para dar forma a famílias diferentes 
da palavra são incluídos também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) ha
puntato su 6 a 8-year-olds sulle famiglie del lessico - sradica le 
parole ed i derivati. Include le attività di pratica che 
introducono l'idea della parola della famiglia e della radice di 
parola. Queste idee sono ricapitolate in una nota esplicativa. 
Le esercitazioni di valutazione di se stesso per formare le 
famiglie differenti di parola egualmente sono incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) που 
στοχεύει σε 6 στο 8-έτος στις λεξικολογικές οικογένειες - λέξεις 
και παράγωγα ρίζας. Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες 
πρακτικής που εισάγουν την ιδέα της λέξης οικογενειών και ρίζας 
λέξης. Αυτές οι ιδέες συνοψίζονται σε μια επεξηγηματική 
αναφορά. Οι ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης για να διαμορφώσουν τις
διαφορετικές οικογένειες λέξης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtsmaterialien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lexicology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multimedia materiell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Primärausbildung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
